block.p: FRIEDMAN-James (Jimmy), in Margate, FL, age 92. Beloved husband of Ida. Devoted father of Arlene and Dr. Paul Ellant, and Dr. Robert and Laura Friedman. Dear brother of David (Duddy). Adored grandfather of Elissa Ellant-Katz and Thomas Katz, Jody EllantReiter and Howard Reiter, Dr. Jonathan Ellant, Josh Friedman and Erika Friedman. Loving and cherished great-grandfather of six. Also survived by many wonderful nieces and nephews. Services today 1 PM, ''Parkside'' Memorial Chapels, Queens Boulevard at 66th Avenue, Forest Hills. ''His Love Will Remain With Us Forever.''
